::KitKat::

She blushed as he kissed her hand. She smiled a bit, more out of 
embarressment, than anything. "Uh...your welcome..uh..yeah."  She 
turned and took a few steps towards a tree where Megatron's body was 
laying near.  She looked at the body. She knelt down and looked at 
the forearms on the body.  She looked at the exposed wiring.  She 
sniffed the scent off the bot. It was that of Megatron. 
She grabbed her side and winced.  She stood up and looked at Phobia, 
then turned and looked at Starscream.  "Starscream, I will need you 
here for a moment."   She thought about taking the spark out of the 
body for analysis back at Destructor's base. "I need the spark out of 
him.  Just to make sure. I know you can clone a body, right down to 
littlest wire, but a real spark can never be truely cloned. I need 
that spark."

She smiled again slightly. She chuckled quietly to herself.  She knew 
she was ingaged to Drillbit, but she couldn't think it was a noble 
gesture for Destructor to kiss her hand like that.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
